attributes.description:
Welcome to Praise Motors,where we sell reliable cars at an affordable price. Used cars for sale in Kempton Park. Johannesburg.We Deal with All Kind Of Used Cars. Cash Deals and Finance Deals Available ,Trade Ins are welcome. Please note, advertised sales prices does not include License and Registration fees

Car Details::::: 2016 AUDI A3 1.2 TFSi AUTOMATIC

Year Model::: 2016

Model Body Shape:::SEDAN		

Engine Capacity::: 1.2

No of Doors::: 5 DOORS

Kilometers::: 85000


We look forward to seeing you at our dealership. Great Prices. Great Vehicles. Great Service. Come See What We Have To Offer. Committed to better service. Creating a Higher Standard. Don’t dream it. Drive it! Drive your dreams

Very clean and well maintained. A well looked after vehicle, looks and smells nice and drives perfectly well.. 
      .We assist you in obtaining the best finance deal in the market with pre-approved finance. 

EXTRAS:::Air Conditioning, ABS,Central Locking System,Clean Interior,Alarm,immaculate condition,Air Bags,Electric Windows,Power Steering,Good Tyres,CD Player.Bluetooth.
                 PRAISE MOTORS
LOCATION::: No  1 Catalina Avenue Rhodesfield Kempton Park. 
Please Contact our sales Agent or whats-app  0833711009 HENRY .

attributes.description: At AutoCity Group we understand how important buying a vehicle is for our customers. And we go out of our way to ensure we deliver to the standards you would expect. We design a package around your budget. All prices exclude administration, delivery and license registration fees. Prices subject to change without prior notice. Test drives welcome. Finance available through all major banks. Finance is subject to Bank Approval. Optional Warranty and Service plans available. Tradeins will be considered. Ts Cs Apply. EOE.

attributes.description:
We offer a premium selection of approved and quality inspected vehicles you can purchase with confidence. All vehicles undergo our OEM mechanical inspection as well as a third-party road worthy certificate upon delivery. We do assist with finance and deliver nationwide to make your experience as effortless as possible. Service/ maintenance plans and mechanical warranties are available for your peace of mind. All trade ins are accepted subject to view. All above services are included in our on the road fees. Contact us today for an unbeatable quote. 
* All specials and discounted stock are subject to in-house finance 
* Listed price excludes all fees/costs.

WAS R299 900 NOW R279 900
Contact Doniven on 062 282 386 or when visiting us PLEASE ask for me by name Doniven Pienaar
Absolutely great value for money
Excellent condition with BRAND NEW tyres!!!
Features on this vehicles to name a few are: 
Air Con 
ABS 
Airbags  
Climate Control
Remote Central Locking 
Electric Mirrors 
Electric Windows  
Radio/CD with Bluetooth
USB & AUX
Multi Function Steering Wheel 
Power Steering
Cruise Control
Reverse Camera
Diff Lock
Traction Control
Smash & Grab safety film
Leather Seats
Alloy wheels
Tow Bar
Side Steps
5 Speed Manual Transmission
No deposit required, Finance available through all major banks. Extended Mechanical warranty options available. Trade-ins are welcome. Nationwide delivery can be arranged! 
Your satisfaction is our motivation! 
Contact Doniven on 062 282 3860
